title: La Mal√©diction de Jonathan Plourde
overview: Every time Jonathan Plourde falls in love, death robs him of his girlfriends. Convinced that he is afflicted with a curse, he resolves to give up life together forever...until Jeanne, a new colleague, makes his heart throb again. Jonathan will try to ignore her feelings, but the mutual attraction is too strong. In order to be able to love again without danger, Jonathan begins an agonizing investigation accompanied by Nic, his best friend, and Marianne, a bizarre work colleague adept at the supernatural.
